title: State.of.Decay.2-CODEX[ArenaBG]
description:
Производител: Undead Labs
Сайт на производителя: https://www.stateofdecay.com
Коментар:
State of Decay brings the ultimate open world zombie survival experience to your windows 10 PC and Xbox. With Xbox Play Anywhere and Cross Play capabilities, you choose how to survive.

Features
Build your community and invite up to three friends to survive in an open world filled with hostile zombies and human enemies.
It’s up to you to establish a base, develop your characters’ abilities, and manage resources to survive as a group in this post-apocalyptic world.
Every decision has lasting consequences. In the end, how you survive just might surprise you.

- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run SetSoD2.exe and install
- Let our installer copy the crack for you!
- Play from Start Menu Shortcut!!
